episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 8:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 1
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 8:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 1

While the Hills were trying to adopt the fifteen children, the Hills were going to Oakdale, Long Island, to visit the cult founded by James Bernard Schafer.  The name of the cult was the Royal Fraternity of the Master Metaphysicians.  The association with the cult would cause trouble for the Hill couple.  Come along with us as we walk through how the Hills came into contact with the cult.

00:00  Introduction
01:03  The Royal Fraternity of the Master Metaphysicians
03:43  Peace Haven
05:48  The Immortality Experiment
07:50  E.J. Kahn Jr. Visits Peace Haven
11:52  Thank You
